name: Dead by Daylight - The Bloodstained Sack
name_original: Dead by Daylight - The Bloodstained Sack
description: A shapeless thing, soaked in blood, holding unholy gifts for the creatures of nightmares. The Bloodstained Sack will allow you to pick up your favourite killing outfit before you start your next chase. This pack now includes 8 new outfits for the Killers.
